entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
